title: Local Government (Fire Inspectors and Fire Officers) Order, 2019
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 293
Gazette dated Friday, 2nd August, 2019
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.44 OF2019
The Local Government Act
(ActNo.2of 2019)
The Local Government (Fire Inspectors and
Fire Officers) Order, 2019
INEXERCISE ofthe powerscontained in section80 of the Local
GovernmentAct,2019,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Fire Title
Inspectors andFireOfficers)Order,2019.
2. The persons namedinthesecondcolumnof theSchedule Appointment
offire
are fire officers andfire inspectors for the districtsset out inthe
inscpectors
firstcolumnof theSchedule. andfire
officers
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK12.00 each
294 StatutoryInstruments 2ndAugust,2019
SCHEDULE
(Regulation2)
